column4: Hello people, I have a 22" monitor and a 7100 GS. When i active the nvidia proprietary my monitor doesnot work. How can I fix that ?
what outputs do you have on your gfx card?
if you got 2 slots then try the other one
hardDisk, On vga out works fine, only in DVI that broke
I'll paste my xconfig but it's like 6 months since I got it to work so I can't remember wtf I did
I will use only device things.
can you update that pastebin with a description of your setup?
just describe your hardware and what you're trying to accomplish in a few paragraphs
http://www.pastebin.org/43843 May i need try envy method ?

just when you override edid like I do then you run the risk that hte card will output a signal your monitor can't grok. but modern displays should be able to handle that without damage, but *caveat emptor*
With opensource driver my display have managed connections fine
closed source is always trial and error :(
HardDrive I have tried to reinstall ubuntu but don't work yet
